## Checklist

- [ ] Build passes with `yarn run check`.
- [ ] Code is formatted with `yarn run format`.
- [ ] Tests have been added for my changes.
- [ ] Code coverage for my change is 100%.
- [ ] Documentation has been updated for my changes.
